name: postcss-logical-property-polyfill

0.1.0.name: postcss-logical-property-polyfill
0.1.0.description: PostCSS plugin that will polyfill inset-inline-(start|end) and border-(start|end)-(start|end)-radius in older browsers that don't support them. The polyfill works by leveraging CSS variables, and works for sub-trees and not just globally.
